group_1.textLeft: Eve will need to flatten its stomach the next@time it leaps up...
We still have a little time before it'll make@another move!
We've got to string it up now!

group_1.textRight: Yes, now's our only chance.
Everyone, tough it out just a bit longer!

group_1.textLeft: Ready, Sana?

group_1.textRight: Yes!
I'll use my chains again...and this time I'll@aim for the joints of its wings!
Everyone else, please help me hang the chains@on the building!

group_1.textLeft: I'll hook them to the roof!

group_1.textRight: I'll pull 'em real tight!

group_1.textLeft: I can take care of the wing joint on the@other side with my ribbons!
I'm counting on all of you to draw those@ribbons tight and secure them!

group_1.textRight: I'll be takin' care of roof stuff alongside@the chick with the huge paper fans.

group_1.textLeft: We'll help haul it up!
We have to save Ui and end this once and@for all!

group_1.textRight: I just heard some creepy laughter from@over there...
This may be risky, but it's our one big shot.
We gotta make the most of it.

group_1.textLeft: Ughhh...!

group_1.textRight: Mami!

group_1.textLeft: Ngh... Unfortunately, it looks like it's@going to be quite the feat to trap it.
If we slip up, it'll just send all the@ribbons flying like it did just now.

group_1.textRight: *Cough* *Splutter*

group_1.textLeft: Sana...!

group_1.textRight: S-sorry, I didn't mean to get you tangled up@in the chains...

group_1.textLeft: No, it's fine...
Just...

group_1.textCenter: We'll never be able to hold Eve completely@still with this few people...
So there's still no way to get at its gem...

group_1.textLeft: It's gotten even closer.

group_1.textRight: That voice just now...was that Mitama? Did@she come back?!
I heard from the twins that Eve's weak points@are the jewels on its body.

group_1.textLeft: And we managed to gather the other Feathers@from where they were scattered about town!
We brought around forty of them here@with us!

group_1.textRight: We wanted to make it easier for you guys to@aim at Eve's gem.

group_1.textLeft: For sure!

group_1.textRight: With this many Feathers to help you, you can@keep Eve as trussed up as you like!

group_1.textLeft: You're right... Now we don't have to settle@for just hanging it up...
We might be able to keep it locked in place.
Thank you so much, Mitama. You really came@through for us this time.
Yes, we're in your debt.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Oh, now really. I wouldn't mind if@you were this grateful all the time.
In exchange, could you spare some people to@come with us?

group_1.textLeft: Why, what's going on?

group_1.textRight: Walpurgisnacht is about to descend on the@city.
We'd like some help to hold it back before@it can reach Eve.

group_1.textLeft: We are still asking other Magical Girls to @gather for the fight...
But they're spread so far apart, it will take@too long for them to get here!

group_1.textCenter: (Walpurgisnacht is here, practically right@in front of my face...)
(We have so many people here that maybe,@this time, we might be able to finish it.)
(But for now we shouldn't get too close...)

group_1.textRight: Then we'll go help!

group_1.textLeft: I agree. There are plenty of Magical Girls@capable of taking over for us.
We should head somewhere where we can make@best use of our abilities.

group_1.textRight: If we don't stop its collision course once@it lands, it'll hit Mitakihara and Kazamino.
I'm on board. I'd lose out more if I ignored@this mess.

group_1.textLeft: Man, you're really not honest with yourself@at all.
Anyway, I'll give it all I got!

group_1.textRight: C'mon, Homura! Let's go!

group_1.textCenter: (If we stand against Walpurgisnacht, there's@a chance I could lose Madoka...)
(But who's to say fate will move in a better@direction if I keep on running?)
(All the girls in front of me are determined@to fight their own fates head on...)
(But all I do is run from mine.)
(I'll face her this time too, as I always@have, with Madoka by my side.)
